Package organisers

Class Broker

java.lang.Object
organisers.Employee
organisers.Broker
All Implemented Interfaces:
Subject
public class Broker
extends Employee
implements Subject
The Broker is the one that actively performs the interaction with both the client and the auction house. He is responsible for taking the client's bids and communicating them to the auction house. Also implements the Subject interface, for better controlling and communicating with Observer objects

  • Method Details

    • deleteAuctionProduct

      public java.lang.Runnable deleteAuctionProduct​(Product p)
      Returns a runnable object for deleting a specified product from the auction house. The method is used for deleting already sold products
      Parameters:
      p - The product to be deleted
      Returns:
      a DeleteTask object

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets all the information kept by the broker for his clients

    • add

      public void add​(Observer o, double maxPrice)
      Adds an observer in the list and an information object, describing the maximum sum the observer is willing to pay
      Parameters:
      o - the observer to be added
      maxPrice - the maximum price he is willing to pay

    • add

      public void add​(Observer o, Product p, double maxPrice) throws DuplicateRequestException
      Adds the observer in the list, alongside the Product and maximum price, which are added as fields for the information object
      Parameters:
      o - the observer to be added
      p - the product the observer wants
      maxPrice - the maximum price the observer is willing to pay
      Throws:
      DuplicateRequestException - if the same product has already been requested by the same observer

    • start

      public void start​(Product demandedProduct)
      Method called by the brokers when the auction is started. All the observers are updated with their information held by the broker
      Parameters:
      demandedProduct - The product demanded by the observers

    • notifyObservers

      public void notifyObservers​(double biggestBid, Product demandedProduct)
      Notifies all the observers about the biggest bid for the demanded product
      Specified by:
      notifyObservers in interface Subject
      Parameters:
      biggestBid - the biggest bid offered by someone
      demandedProduct - the product demanded by the observers

    • notifyObserver

      public void notifyObserver​(Observer o, double bid)
      Notifies a specific observer about the biggest bid for the demanded product
      Specified by:
      notifyObserver in interface Subject
      Parameters:
      o - the Observer to be notified
      bid - the maximum bid in the current step of an auction

    • removeObserver

      public void removeObserver​(Observer o)

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      o - the Observer to be removed

    • notifyWinner

      public java.lang.String notifyWinner​(double bid, Product demandedProduct)
      Computes the winner of the auction
      Parameters:
      bid - the winning bid, that is, the biggest bid from all steps
      demandedProduct - the demanded product by the participants
      Returns:
      a string representation of the winner

    • bid

      public java.util.List<java.lang.Double> bid​(Product auctionProd)
      Method that requests all the clients to bid for the specified product
      Parameters:
      auctionProd - the product the clients must bid for
      Returns:
      a List of doubles including all bids
